texts.mainText:
Asset Rebalancing made easy!
Because you set the pace and not your portfolio.

errorMessages.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errorMessages.passwordLength: Your password has to be at least 8 characters long
errorMessages.passwordChars: Your password should contain at least on uppercase character

searchbar.placeholder: Search for stocks, ETFs & more (Term, WKN or ISIN)

footer.heading: Haven't found your asset?
footer.description: Create your own assets or groups, in order to fully represent your portfolio.

tooltips.groupPercentageWrapper: The target distributions inside a group has to be 100%

tooltips.totalTargetPercentage: The target distributions of all assets has to be 100%
tooltips.totalDeviation: deviation from a fully balanced portfolio

emptyListBackground.text1: Search or create Assets, to fully represent your portfolio.
emptyListBackground.text2: Determine what your optimal portfolio balance should look like.
emptyListBackground.text3: With this foundation, you are able to use all of our rebalancing features.

underConstruction.heading: Under Construction
underConstruction.description: This section is currently under construction. We look forward to presenting you here more soon.
